## Purpose

::: col-sm-6
This website highlights work that I have carried out as a Trainer . This is in support of my application to Terenure Enterprise Centre for the position of Digital Skills Trainer.

## Background

Terenure Enterprise Centre supports economic development and job creation in the community. Part of the facilities that it provides to service users in training in digital applications.
